name: REVIVAL TD
description:
ENGLISH

REVIVAL TD

Revival TD is a tower defense - horror game. Try to protect the shed from the hordes of dark creatures and defeat the boss to survive. This game contains graphical horror. 

Created for Revival Jam.

Instructions:

Build towers to defend the shed from hordes of monsters. Upgrade your towers to make them more powerful or sell them in case you don't need them. The game has a total of 13 rounds.

Controls:

Mouse: Drag the camera Mouse Wheel: Zoom In / Out

Credits:

SFX by MisterKidX & Tonsil5
VFX by johndh ,yughues
Zombies by Penny Holistic3d.com
Turrets by Brackeys (https://brackeys.com)
Portal by Curtis (https://3dwarehouse.sketchup.com/model/728d67667b1f5975aaf7643487006f98/Portal?l...)
House by The Shed BlackAntStudios Assets Store
